messages.subject: Still looking for cold-beverage stuff, but...
messages.msgSnippet: Caffeine is a health and spiritual hazard that may cost you your  eternal life. ... (saw that on a google link when I went looking for cold beverage dangers I
messages.messageBody:
Caffeine is a health and spiritual hazard that may cost you your eternal
life. ...

(saw that on a google link when I went looking for cold beverage dangers I
used to read about somewhere, pre-internet days)

Here's their full explanation of that:
-=-Caffeine is a health and spiritual hazard that may cost you your eternal
life. One study showed that increasing consumption of caffeine causes a
corresponding decrease in religious involvement as measured by church attendance.
-=-

Maybe it's the other way around. People decide to stop living lives of
controlled deprivation and think maybe they could also drink tea or soda. Our
church always had a ton of available coffee.

Those were considered to be facts against evolution, I guess, because at the
bottom of the page it said this:


PATHLIGHTS
PO Box 300
Altamont, TN 37301
For many more Facts against Evolution, Visit: _http://evolution-facts.org_
(http://evolution-facts.org/)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
